attributes.action: Bring the traditional American breakfast burrito to all UK McDonald’s
attributes.additional_details: As many have wanted this for a while because of how nice it is supposed to be
attributes.background: Implement the request by getting McDonald’s to bring forth the breakfast burrito from America to the UK aswell

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what products to sell are a matter for individual hospitality venues, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
